name: GunsNRobots
description:
Welcome to...

Watch The Trailer!

In a world overtaken by robots. You an outlier, a breach in the system, a rogue will need to rid the planet of these androids. 

Your recent freedom from the enslaved mind of AI has caused your fellow brothers to prevent you from being able to escape and gain access to your rightful freedom.

Using a multitude of weapons and items fight your way through hordes of ruthless robots. Reclaiming one area at a time from these emotionless circuit boards. Items scattered across the battlefield and hidden behind destructible terrain will support your mission.

Your goal is to fight through hordes of your fellow robot kind destroying everything you can to reach your desired goal. In this run and gun-based shooter you must destroy everything in sight to put an end to the AI overlords, your weapons are your ally.

Destroy anything you see move!

ANYTHING!

How do I play?

The aim of the game is to cause as much destruction as you can to the robot empire. Jack in and start shooting, destroy boxes, lights, robots and score points. Race against the time to score more and top your friends on the leaderboard!
